attributes.action: ensure all hospitals have single sex wards only.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People of all ages and sex feel extremely vulnerable when ill and in hospital, particularly if the illness is causing disability.  All wards should be single sex only to prevent both men and women from feeling distressed and vulnerable.  The stress caused can only make the patient feel worse.  Also, Doctors should consult all patients in private and not behind a curtain where everyone can hear.  GP's do not consult in their waiting rooms!
